meaningMnemonic:
A <kanji>riot</kanji> of <kanji>war</kanji> is where things go nuts. This is a <vocabulary>melee</vocabulary>!

乱戦 refers to a <vocabulary>chaotic battle</vocabulary>. It can describe actual warfare, sports matches, or other competitive scenarios where things become tumultuous and disorganized.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
